content:
TERM: SPR Manager Cognitive Capability

DEFINITION:
Cognitive capability corresponding to SPR Manager. Provides the higher-order cognitive support for the operational SPR Manager system, ensuring symmetrical architecture between cognitive and operational levels.

[From agi.txt]: SPR: 0.010, "Architecture"

BLUEPRINT DETAILS:
Created to maintain symmetrical architecture with SPR Manager system.

EXAMPLE APPLICATION:
Providing cognitive guidance for SPR Manager operational processes.

CATEGORY: CognitiveCapability

RELATIONSHIPS:
type: CognitiveCorrespondence; confidence: 0.85; corresponds_to: SPRmanageR; level: Above; enables: CognitiveSupport, HigherOrderProcessing, StrategicGuidance, SymmetricalArchitecture

CONTEXT TYPE: Conversation-derived knowledge (no direct spec/code, enriched from agi.txt conversations)

IMPLICIT KNOWLEDGE: This SPR represents knowledge understood through conversation context and osmosis
